name: FX Composer Project File
summary: Project file created by FX Composer, an IDE used for creating shaders, which define how to render graphics on hardware GPUs ; may contain references to 3D object files ( .DAE , .3DS , .FBX , .OBJ , .X ) as well as specifications for how the 3D objects appear; supports HLSL, COLLADA FX Cg, and CgFX languages.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
